sentences.sContent: They sold the house for treble the amount they paid for it.
sentences.sCn: 他们以买进时三倍的价格卖掉了房子。

synos.tran: [数]三倍的；最高声部的；三层的；三重的

trans.tranCn: 三倍的；最高声部的；三层的；三重的
trans.tranOther: a treble voice or instrument produces high notes
three times as big, as much, or as many as something else
to become three times as big in amount, size, or number, or to make something increase in this way
